## Status of L1-O2O

<br>

* [System is upgraded](http://kkotov.github.io/l1o2o/talks/2015.04.20/) from the LHC Run 1 (thanks to Mike, et al.)
* It runs at p5: till 2015-06-03 (run #247955) in 72X and 74X after
 * according to Vasile, 74X includes the latest greatest L1 menu
* Soon it'll need to include the Stage 1 calorimeter trigger
